event.title: I ♥ Free Software Day in Chaos Computer Club in Frankfurt, Germany

body.p: On the public evening, February 14th at the Chaos Computer Club in Frankfurt, we want to celebrate the "I Love Free Software Day" 🥳. Everyone interested in the topic of Free Software is welcome to stop by and participate!
In addition to a small program of a few 📢 Lightning Talks (5' lectures) and a 🍕 Pizza Party, the evening should be used for discussions about Free Software.
